value:
Julian's put thievery behind him,
but don't let me hear you say he's
lost his edge. No way.

I was thinking about quitting thieving
and joining up with the chief. There's
more than one way to get gold!

Always seemed to me that all these
royals and knights were nasty bits of
work. Besides Marth 'n Kris, I mean.

One of them fancy-lookin' thieves
was eyeing me and Julian. What's
that all about?

There must be PLENTY of treasure
just lyin' around in this castle. Don't
think anybody'd miss a tiny bit...

Name's Rickard. I'm a big-time
thief—at least for now—over at
$Nf's castle!

I'm gonna do my best today—
Julian's watching!

I'm a damn sight better than this!
I could do this in my sleep!

Are you kiddin' me?! Just like with
the chief, I put myself out there and
got nothin' to show for it...

You're giving this to me? Big shot,
ain't ya? Heh.

The name's Rickard! Julian asked me
to help out with the Thieves' Masque.
You can count on me!

Askr's a funny place, ain't it? Who'd
stage a festival for thieves?$k$pIt isn't usually a job you shout about.
"Hey! I'm a thief!" Nah. Like Julian
said, you can't hold your head high.$k$pBut if I can play the role of a big-time
thief and make the festival more fun,
then maybe being a thief is worth it!$k$p'Course, Julian ain't a thief
anymore, so I have to work twice
as hard to make things lively!$k$pI'll show you what a big-time thief
can do! Keep your eyes peeled,
Chief!
Nowhere to hide!
Time to get rich!
I'm with you, Julian.
Ooo! Looks nice.
Got caught...
I'm Rickard, a small-time thief. But it seems like you have something big in mind…
*startled reaction* Oh, it's you! I thought I got nabbed.
Moving quietly, picking locks... Julian taught me everything I know.
If I'm a big-time thief now, does that mean I can steal as much as I want? Oh, nice!
Chief... Throwing me away like that was just too cruel.
I wonder if any treasure is lying around here... Time for a look-see!
It's settled! I'll lend you a hand. But I'll take a cut of the loot as payment!
Message received.
OK.
I'm going too!
